analytic.title: The Argument of Severus of Antioch on the Absurdity of Confessing Two Common Natures in Christ, the Reciprocal Argumentation of Johannes of Caesarea and the Monophysite-Chalcedonite Christological Debates of the VI–VII Centuries. Part 3

body.bibl: Nogovitsin, Oleg N. “The Argument of Severus of Antioch on the Absurdity of Confessing Two Common Natures in Christ, the Reciprocal Argumentation of Johannes of Caesarea and the Monophysite-Chalcedonite Christological Debates of the VI–VII Centuries. Part 3.” Библия и христианская древность 3 [15] (2022): 69–103.

Nogovitsin, The Argument of Severus of Antioch on the Absurdity of Confessing Two Common Natures in Christ, the Reciprocal Argumentation of Johannes of Caesarea and the Monophysite-Chalcedonite Christological Debates of the VI–VII Centuries.
